tweet_text: @WDWNT The virtual queue is like soup, it needs refining and additions, but not to just be thrown out because it was hard. They’ve only been using it for less than a year. The sky tram has broken down more times than the queue, so let’s retire that too. Nonsense!

tweet_text: So much of the text is quotable, but this strikes me as a particularly important point: "Our conceptions of the white supremacist global order unduly forecloses the possibility of an honest confrontation of intra-racial violences and the legacies of African empires."
